original_title: 目が覚めると隣には褐色ハーフの超ヤリマン美女！昨晩は激しくヤリまくった！？最悪だ！全然記憶が無い！と思ったら彼女がエッチの続きを求めてきて… 沙和れもん
overview: When I wake up, a brown half-beautiful woman I don't know at all is sleeping next to me! ? It seems like I had a fateful encounter at the bar I was drinking last night, but I was so muddled that I don't remember the hot night when I fucked so much last night! ? the worst! I could have sex with such a beautiful woman! When I was depressed, she seemed to like my chi-po very much, and even when I returned to the sorrow, I asked for the continuation of yesterday, so I enjoyed all of the bimbo half-beauties! Rolling out again and again!
title: I Woke Up To Find A Gorgeous Tanned Half-Japanese Slut Resting Beside Me! We Fucked Last Night?! Oh No! I Don't Remember A Thing! Except She Seems To Want To Pick Up Where We Left Off... Remon Sawa
